section.name: Mega mapper
section.p: This module creates and queries a database containing basically cross references to/from UniProt entries to other databases used by the Enzyme Portal:
Note the direction of the arrows. The mega-map stores whenever possible the concrete relationship between two entries.

Please note that cross-references between UniProt entries and substrates/products/cofactors are not direct, but through the EC classification of the protein.
Note also that inhibitors/activators are text-mined from the Enzyme regulation comments in UniProt, so it is likely some are missing, and some might even be wrong.
